channel.title: Anon vs Scientology
channel.description:
Well I know most of the irc people probably have heard of this, but I figured I'd post. The people in the "FOX11 Video(refer to thread "epic lulz)" video have struck again..
Story: http://www.knbc.com/news/15132220/detail.html
Though this time they made a big mistake, because Scientology have great lawyers, very persistent I must say, and will go after who's doing this. Seeing as I live near one of their spiritual head quarters, they are in the news quiet often. One thing recently was they filed charges against the transist system for allowing ads on the buses that said "Think twice about Scientology, etc) and one the case with flying colors.
Discuss?

item.title: Anon vs Scientology
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:37, topic:175851”][quote author=Carson link=topic=236497.msg2022268#msg2022268 date=1201678415]
Anon spent like over 10 grand on ddos’ing shit, didn’t they?
[/quote]
That was Scientology buying DDoS protection.[/quote]

Oh, thats what it was.

It didn’t work did it, loll?

Read full topic

item.title: Anon vs Scientology
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“Buzzy, post:22, topic:175851”]Lol. I really hope this group can do better than waste a couple bucks on BLACK ink, ddos their servers, and make fucking prank phone calls, cmon, that is fucking pathetic. It honestly sounds like something a fucking middle schooler with a dictionary in his hand and to much time on his hands would pull. Taking down a religion is almost impossible. Being the big bad west posse of the internet, almost impossible. Honestly, what is this going to do other than get a lot of people sued/jailed, waste the followers money on protection (where else will they get the cash to fix your vandalism?), and get your group publicized, which most “hacker” groups do a lot to not have happen.

Personally, I think that they’re doing this because they fail that Scientology has overstepped their boundaries, and it’s time to take them out of “their” domain, but I’d like to know when the fuck the internet was given ownership to these guys. If your going to go after someone who has done the internet wrong in your eyes, what about all the recording companies, or companies that censor the internet.

Personally, if this was my project, and I wanted to go after them, I’d do something a lot more productive, say, I don’t know, assasinate http://www.scientology.org’s head IT guy or something. Anonymous should grow the fuck up, and step up their artiliary, or just quit so that they don’t look like idiots to people that could do better than them…

OMG!!! THEY DDOS MY SERVERSS!!! AHH!!![/quote]

You miss the whole point, anon are an internet group not murderers. No school kid pull shit like this, they don’t have the resources or the guts.

Read full topic

What would make it a real group? Does a group require a leader or some sort of hierarchy to unite in a common goal?

The Cruise Indoctrination Video Scientology Tried To Suppress

You have to watch this video. It shows Tom Cruise, with all the wide-eyed fervor that he brings to the promotion of a movie, making the argument for Scientology, the bizarre 20th-century religion. Making the argument is an understatement. The...

item.title: Anon vs Scientology
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:2, topic:176003”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=236497.msg2018754#msg2018754 date=1201481173]
The whole thing between “Anon” vs Scientology is stupid.

  1. if people are stupid enough to believe Scientology then they deserve to be ripped off.
  2. Anon isn’t even a real group of people, its just random people who browse the internet and 4chan every so often.

But meh, i suppose its kinda funny. Its funny how Scientologists are taking it as a serious threat.
[/quote]
how is it not a serious threat?[/quote]
Well not to be rude, as i do love “Anon” but what have they done so far except for taking down a few scientology websites?

Read full topic

item.title: Anon vs Scientology
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Anon just want retarded 11 year olds to download shit and DDoS a server. They are pathetic and act like they are all big.

I know this absolute chinky stereotype (listens to j-rock, j-rap, j-pop and loves anime and psps) who thinks he’s an absolute genius at computers and I was talking to him then he goes “Oh yeah tonight we are gonna DDoS the scientology website!” and I was like “we? who is we?” and he goes “me and my hacking crew Anonymous, we take people down if they mess with us and Scientology has messed big time!”

I just nod my head and go along with it because he doesn’t understand how to have a conversation. He’s such a fucking chinky bitch!

Read full topic

item.title: Anon vs Scientology
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

Lol. I really hope this group can do better than waste a couple bucks on BLACK ink, ddos their servers, and make fucking prank phone calls, cmon, that is fucking pathetic. It honestly sounds like something a fucking middle schooler with a dictionary in his hand and to much time on his hands would pull. Taking down a religion is almost impossible. Being the big bad west posse of the internet, almost impossible. Honestly, what is this going to do other than get a lot of people sued/jailed, waste the followers money on protection (where else will they get the cash to fix your vandalism?), and get your group publicized, which most “hacker” groups do a lot to not have happen.

Personally, I think that they’re doing this because they fail that Scientology has overstepped their boundaries, and it’s time to take them out of “their” domain, but I’d like to know when the fuck the internet was given ownership to these guys. If your going to go after someone who has done the internet wrong in your eyes, what about all the recording companies, or companies that censor the internet.

Personally, if this was my project, and I wanted to go after them, I’d do something a lot more productive, say, I don’t know, assasinate http://www.scientology.org’s head IT guy or something. Anonymous should grow the fuck up, and step up their artiliary, or just quit so that they don’t look like idiots to people that could do better than them…

OMG!!! THEY DDOS MY SERVERSS!!! AHH!!!
